snippet: The 2013-14 season will feature Ms. Churchill’s “Love and Information,” Will Power’s “Fetch Clay, Make Man,” “What’s It All About? Bacharach Reimagined” and a fourth play to be announced.
abstract: The 2013-14 season will feature Ms. Churchill’s “Love and Information,” Will Power’s “Fetch Clay, Make Man,” “What’s It All About? Bacharach Reimagined” and a fourth play to be announced.

headline.main: New York Theater Workshop's New Season to Feature Caryl Churchill Play
headline.print_headline: Caryl Churchill Returning  To Theater Workshop
